data.title: Saori Hayami
data.meta_description: Saori Hayami (早見 沙織; born May 29, 1991 in Tokyo, Japan) is a Japanese singer and voice actress. She's known for voicing: Miyuki Shiba in The Irregular at Magic High School. RWBY (2015-2017) - Ruby Rose Wish Dragon (2021) - Li Na 07-Ghost (2009) - Mikage (Burupya), Razette Basquash! (2009) ...
data.text:
Saori Hayami (早見 沙織; born May 29, 1991 in Tokyo, Japan) is a Japanese singer and voice actress.

She's known for voicing: Miyuki Shiba in The Irregular at Magic High School.

Animation Voice Work

Animation - Dubbing

RWBY (2015-2017) - Ruby Rose

Streaming Television Movies - Dubbing

Wish Dragon (2021) - Li Na
